weapons.name: Half-Sugar Bunny
weapons.description: A very strong W-Engine for Zhao giving a bunch of different buffs like 10% <atk> ATK and 30% CDMG while giving her extra ER% allowing her passive full uptime.
weapons.title: Best W-Engine

weapons.name: Tusks of Fury
weapons.description: While nowhere near close to Zhao's Engine this is still a decent option due to proving a decent 18% DMG%.
weapons.title: 2nd Best Option

weapons.name: Original Transmorpher
weapons.description: While not being able to compete with her Signature or Tusks of Fury it still has a decent <hp> HP% main stat allowing near of full DMG% of her passive.
weapons.title: Best A Rank Option

four_pieces.name: Astral Voice
four_pieces.description: Likely to be the best option for Zhao due to the lack of options for the defense class as a whole.

two_pieces.name: Moonlight Lullaby / Yunkui Tales
two_pieces.description: Go Moonlight Lullaby if you need more ER% for her buff uptime or Yukui Tales if you want more <hp> HP% for her passive.

stat.sub_stats: <hp> HP% or <hp> Flat HP until 27000 > <cr> CRATE% > <cd> CDMG%

extra_sections.title: HP stat note
extra_sections.description: Zhao needs 27000 <hp> HP BEFORE combat to gain the maximum bonus of 40% DMG% from her passive, focus on getting as close to possible.

mindscapes.description: When switching out of Zhao provides everyone with a decent 15% RES Ignore buff.
Whenever Zhao restores <hp> HP she increases her own <atk> ATK% and providing everyone a juicy 15% in-combat <atk> ATK% buff.
Regularly gives Zhao extra Decibels while buffing her own DMG.
Gives massive stat and DMG bonuses to Zhao.
